TABLE.NAME: local_kaltura_log
TABLE.COMMENT: Log requests and response to and from the Kaltura server.

FIELD.NAME: module
FIELD.COMMENT: The module the request or response originated from.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: REQ if it was a request to Kaltura. RES if it was s response to Kaltura.

FIELD.NAME: endpoint
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL the request or response went to.

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: The data contained in the request or response. Contains a serialized array of data.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: A Unix timestamp for when the request or response was logged.
